comments: I like the concept so far. I always wanted to play Sims on the go; now I can. I wonder if this game simulates life accurately. You can't have a life sim game without being able to make your avatar a member of the LGBTQA community. This is why I like Second Life. It allows me to be me (gay and proud) and doesn't judge. Will definitely add five 🌟 s if this feature is added along with In-game events that allows you to pursue your chosen lifestyle.

ANYONE WHO GIVES THIS GAME A LOW RATING NEEDS TO SIT DOWN . I love that u have more customization with face and body structure similar to the way you do on Sims 4. The graphics in general are nice. My favorite part is that it's online. I love being able to chat with other Sims users and add them n stuff. Also am glad its not in real time ... I hate having to wait hours on FreePlay to get stuff done. This game is best. Lovelovelove

I was so excited that the game is finally released untill when i want to start the game, the game starts with just the opening EA and Maxis title and then the game close it self. Is this a bug? My phone works well with other heavy games but how it cannot run The Sims Mobile?? Please fix this and i will change my rating! I use Lenovo Vibe K5.

So far so good. Its better than the Sims Freeplay. I'd love it more if it was more like the actual sims. Please change the way this game is. Make it to where we can cook, and choose our sims personality traits, have babies, die lol/legacies, go to work for 8 hrs and actually make a decent amount of simoleons, actually have freedom you know? The actual sims gameplay!!! I love the task list and how we do have to unlock new worlds and items, but it'll be more exciting to unlock stuff to me if this game was more like the original sims. If we had the opportunity to play all day non stop like the original sims, I believe everyone would enjoy the game more. Please make a change to the game and make it more like the actual sims!!!

It's not everything I wanted, that's for sure. This is a great game and I really enjoy working aspect is fun. The rest is boring. Little customization for sim, cannot interect with others like I thought and have to level up to customize house which is sad. I wish we could start with a little more, even have to unlock our personality. Whats up with that? Overall this seems like a really good game but its not the sims I was expecting

In short.. been waiting to see what this had to offer.  Not a bad game. Granted it is way Better than "sims freeplay" however I expected more from EA. It's a nice app. Gameplay is good. Graphics are better than I thought. The in app purchases are what will get you.  For me though the Sims pc is where it's still at, for me anyway nothing beats the PC Version either Sims 3 or 4 Both are very good.   But there's enough here to tickle anyone's fancy. Hats off to the devs on this mobile game version!
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and décor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims’ appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. SHAPE YOUR SIMS’ LIFESTYLE Guide the stories of your Sims’ lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. PLAY TOGETHERHost and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people’s Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!____________Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. description: Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you! New Features:●	Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.●	Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.●	Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.Classic Features:●	Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.●	Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe. ●	Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.●	Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.●	Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!●	Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.●	Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades. PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans. A network connection is also required. Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support. Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/ Parent’s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents
descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

description: Welcome to the Battle Arena! Fight in a free-to-play real-time PVP multiplayer online brawler! Pick one of the unique heroes with drastically different skills and battle against other real players in action packed, fast-paced matches.Only 5 minutes to finish the match!Make your Heroes stronger by upgrading them and equipping with the strongest gear possible.You can play alone or team-up with friends to dominate the Arena.And remember: your reaction is not enough - strategy and teamwork is the key to the ultimate victory!Features:Quick paced and short matches that allow you to play anytime and anywhere Huge variety of tactics - find your own combination and sharpen your skillsChoose from a range of unique Heroes Take part in tactical fights full of action Play solo or team up with friends Smooth controls that will make you focus on the game and not on tapping!PLEASE NOTE: Battle Arena is currently in early development mode; if you encounter any problems while playing or have any feedback you’d like to share, please visit our official Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/projectbattlearena/ The game requires a stable Internet connection.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Battle Arena! Fight in a free-to-play real-time PVP multiplayer online brawler!
Pick one of the unique heroes with drastically different skills and battle against other real players in action packed, fast-paced matches.

Only 5 minutes to finish the match!
Make your Heroes stronger by upgrading them and equipping with the strongest gear possible.
You can play alone or team-up with friends to dominate the Arena.
And remember: your reaction is not enough - strategy and teamwork is the key to the ultimate victory!

Features:
Quick paced and short matches that allow you to play anytime and anywhere
Huge variety of tactics - find your own combination and sharpen your skills
Choose from a range of unique Heroes
Take part in tactical fights full of action
Play solo or team up with friends

comments: Love that it gets more challenging
Its amazing app
Totally love this app, its very addictive and gets more challenging as you level up

This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

★ CONTACT ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com

description: Navy Storm: Warships Battle Royal is a free-to-play mobile multiplayer online strategy war game, in which you will take the position as the lead commander to build and level up your base, lead your powerful fleet into epic global naval warfare to re-write the history of World War II with real-time 3D gameplay. To become the conqueror of the ocean, you need more than just a well-prepared naval base, you will also need to build up your own custom-made fleet that includes a variety of Battleships, Cruisers, Destroyers and Aircraft carriers, train Captains for each warship and lead the fleet into naval warfare, blast the enemies with countless steel cannons, stir up a naval battle storm! Features:Brand New 3D Refined modelNavy Storm: Warships Battle Royal is based on well-known naval battles in the history of World War II. The models are created strictly following the design of historical battleships. Perfectly restored various types of battleships from different counties. With the new 3D drawing technique, you will be able to see remarkable details. Strategic GameplayEnjoy the thrill of battle through seven seas at your fingertips, become the king of the sea through countless blood bath battles! Follow the storyline, and go through Pearl Harbor. Midway Island and other classic historic battles, witnessed and remake the history!Rich Content, More Straightforward BattlesIt is up to you to become the king of the seven seas that lives through endless fights, or just play it safe and conquer an isolated island? Confront the enemies, blast them with all fire power, and everything you have got! The glory belongs to you, you are here to dominate them all!Battle with Worldwide Commanders Play with millions of players from around the world, become the true conqueror of seven seas.Legendary Generals and Classic WarshipsBecome the supreme commander, assemble ships and blast the forefront! Gather the legendary combat ships and generals to fight for you, conquer the world, rewrite the glorious naval battle history!
descriptionHTML:

To become the conqueror of the ocean, you need more than just a well-prepared naval base, you will also need to build up your own custom-made fleet that includes a variety of Battleships, Cruisers, Destroyers and Aircraft carriers, train Captains for each warship and lead the fleet into naval warfare, blast the enemies with countless steel cannons, stir up a naval battle storm!

Navy Storm: Warships Battle Royal is based on well-known naval battles in the history of World War II. The models are created strictly following the design of historical battleships. Perfectly restored various types of battleships from different counties. With the new 3D drawing technique, you will be able to see remarkable details.

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

This game is amazing, a load of fun and very competitive with friends, unfortunately no multiplayer on it.Would love for more Fluffies in the future with different abilities. Also Fluffies you can unlock by doing certain challenges and other stuff. You can also create a level mode where you have challenging levels to complete for coins or Fluffies, and one last thing, you all should have a head to head mode to see who can last the longest going against each other. Those are just some suggestions that I think would make the game even better than it already is.

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! 😊💕

This is so fun and cute! I love the cute little furries, Awesome graphics and simple BUT FUN gameplay. One down side is It's little glitchy while doing levels and maybe some Furries from TV, Disney, books ect.like for an example: Mickey mouse, Pikachu, Totoro ect....If you can fix this I'll rate  it 5 starts
description: Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way. descriptionHTML:
Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way.

The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Features:
• Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush.
• Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
• Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.

The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!

Ive never been a fan of having to wait for energy in games but I guess that's what makes a smart phone game addictive. Try making it so getting diamonds is a little more easy (random drops etc.) But I guess you probably get more as you level up. Opening crates gives the game a better drive and makes it more addictive. All in all a solid game though..

I know the Concept from Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes and I've been looking for something similar ever since I've finished it. The fact that there are four colours to combine makes it a bit trickier, as it gets less likely to easily combine three (or more) of a kind, but that makes it just a tad bit more challenging.  So far it feels like a really neat game, though I still haven't unlocked anything but the Campaign and Treasure Cave.
After all levels is no challenges to play dy, only day to day to complete all the quest to get the character and gems. No one in my group want to continue playing.

You can create new worlds and load in multiplayer mode for other research, or to explore the worlds of your friends. Go around all the islands, find all the useful resources, conquer all the mountain tops, feel the freshness of waterfalls, build your city, your fort, to protect against hazards. And believe me, it's not all that you can do in this game!

description: The Walking Dead: Our World is a first-of-a-kind location based mobile game that immerses you into the zombie apocalypse. Defend your surroundings by fighting walkers on the streets, in the park, on your sofa - wherever you are and whenever you feel like it. Join forces with Rick, Daryl, Michonne and all your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead.• FIGHT walkers in the real-world based on your location• EXPLORE the world around you, find walkers, clear your surroundings and leave your mark on the map for other players to find• COLLECT legendary characters, weapons and items from AMC’s The Walking Dead• COOPERATE in weekly challenges with other players in groups for bigger rewards• UNITE with other players, save survivors, build shelters and reclaim your city from the walker threat• SHARE your best apocalyptic moments for other players and for the whole world to enjoyAnd remember: Aim for the head.
descriptionHTML:
The Walking Dead: Our World is a first-of-a-kind location based mobile game that immerses you into the zombie apocalypse. Defend your surroundings by fighting walkers on the streets, in the park, on your sofa - wherever you are and whenever you feel like it. description: One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch. In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!In One Line with One Touch you will find:•  Hundreds of challenging packs. All of the are free•  Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday•  Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!Only 1% of people can complete some of the puzzles in this game. Can you complete them?
descriptionHTML:
One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

In One Line with One Touch you will find:
• Hundreds of challenging packs. All of the are free
• Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday
• Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!

Only 1% of people can complete some of the puzzles in this game. Can you complete them?

description: Help Jude the cat and all his furry friends turn this dilapidated mansion into the most incredible kitty sanctuary ever!Unravel the amazing love story of Millicent and Martin, the previous owners. Fill the mansion with cats! Send your kitties out to explore the city of Mancatten and meet all the amazing humans that were a part of Millicent's life. Find all the special furniture scattered across the city and discover all the whimsical rare cats that can find a home with you!Game Features- Unlock and renovate all 24 rooms and yard areas in the mansion!- Level up to 80 to unlock everything!- Unlock all the amazing furniture and watch your cats play!- Complete story quests for special rewards! - Customize your mansion by choosing furniture and placing it wherever you want!- Discover all the secret keepsakes in the mansion to unravel the incredible love story of Millicent and Martin!- Explore the city of Mancatten and meet over 5,000 cats!Kitty Keeper is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this option simply turn it off in your device's menus.
descriptionHTML:
Help Jude the cat and all his furry friends turn this dilapidated mansion into the most incredible kitty sanctuary ever!

Unravel the amazing love story of Millicent and Martin, the previous owners. Fill the mansion with cats! Send your kitties out to explore the city of Mancatten and meet all the amazing humans that were a part of Millicent's life. Find all the special furniture scattered across the city and discover all the whimsical rare cats that can find a home with you!

Game Features

- Unlock and renovate all 24 rooms and yard areas in the mansion!

- Customize your mansion by choosing furniture and placing it wherever you want!
- Discover all the secret keepsakes in the mansion to unravel the incredible love story of Millicent and Martin!
- Explore the city of Mancatten and meet over 5,000 cats!

Kitty Keeper is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this option simply turn it off in your device's menus.

This will be fun for sure. Other wise in current context folks will get disheartened sooner than expected and would cease to play it and that I suppose should be amended ASAP. Thank you.

You need to make up your mind if you are using British English or US English. Seems Americans don't realize the past tense of 'spell' is either 'spelt' or 'spelled' in the US you don't often see it spelled 'spelt' (LOL) although both SPELT AND SPELLED ARE CORRECT. You do this with other words with US & UK spelling differences.  You forget both are correct. It was British English a thousand years before it was American English. Americans have been BUTCHERING English for about 300 years now.

description: Test your spelling skills and challenge people from all around the world in our newest English spelling word game called Spelling Challenge! Are you good enough in spelling to be able to make it into TOP20 global highscores?Spelling Challenge is a new educational English spelling game that will check your spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game contains hundreds of misspelled English words, addicting and original gameplay, global leaderboards and a lot of other features that will improve your spelling skills in an original and enjoyable way! You will never fail in spelling test at school again! How to play: There will be shown a word on a screen and your task is to decide if the word is spelled correctly or not! You must answer correctly a number of words that equals to "TODO" number to be able to progress to the next level! Watch out, in each level you can make max 5 mistakes. Also watch out for level limit shown under the word. If you lose the level, you can play it again (max three times), then you must start over. Scoring: Your score depends on your speed and number of mistakes you make. There is also an overall score = total score from all games you ever played, so more times you play = better score you get!Features:* Educational and challenging English vocabulary spelling game not only for kids but for all ages* Thousands of most misspelled words included* Great way to improve your spelling skills, grammar and vocabulary knowledge* Global leaderboards included - submit your score and compare it with other people all around the world* Share your score with your friends via facebook, google+, WhatsApp, twitter and other social networks* Review your spelling progress and words in which you made mistakes* A must game for all the spelling bee game fans* Simple to play, no need to read instructions* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases* From a creator of 5+ popular spelling gamesHave fun and if you find any bug or if you have any idea to improve the game, please let us know! (If you enjoy the game, please leave a rating and some comment, it helps us a lot in adding new and mainly free features.)Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/Email: littlebigplay@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
descriptionHTML:

comments: Good looking game ruined by slow combat.   You have 4 team members in the beginning, each with 3 abilities. But only one ability can be used, and everyone has to wait 5-6 second global cool down to be able to use a next skill. Global CD on top of the native cool down is not fun. Each battle becomes just an auto attack for 2 minutes, and takes strategy straight out the window.

Would be nice to be able to actually use skills without having to wait agonizingly long for every single skill to come off cool down, even though you only used 1 Skill.. And then have to wait 2 minutes for that same skill to come off cooldown. Too long and too boring. Fix cooldowns and you might have an interesting game

The game pretty much plays by itself. You enter into a level and it's a one time boss fight and so far that is all there is to it. As far as customization goes you can only equip ruins. I don't think there's an option to change weapon or armor. Lots to read in the tutorial, the lack of voice overs doesn't really bother me. Graphics are good and you can unlock some pretty good main characters, more at level 4. If this was an open world with full customization it would have a been an amazing game. Overall, it's not the worst game on the market!

No reward for pre-register player? Already have 2 master, but disapoint coz cant play 2 master together.. Bad gacha system, need summons stone but still need gold to summon, chance to get hero *4+ very low..

Firstly, the game is beautiful. Secondly,  a way to improve on this game is to let users switch off full auto,  meaning turn based mode,  just like Summoners War.  Thirdly,  prices are way too high on everything.  Fourthly,  game launches with little to no reward. A welcome gift of sorts would be appreciated.  Fifthly,  Some hero voice overs would be nice.  All in all,  a beautiful game marred by the usual greediness of their makers.

This game is a disappointment, coming from all the hype it garnered. Graphics is good but gameplay has no originality and needs no input from the player. If you're into this game and wants more player input (like positioning of healers/tank and DPS during fights) try Velator. Same quality with actual need of player input.. I'm in Velator. Guild Elitists.

descriptionHTML:
A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

■ Be a Light in the Darkness
- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.
- Expand the territory in any direction you desire!
- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

■ Collect Masters & Servants
- Form your Crusade among 5 Masters and over 100 Servants.
- Enhance, Evolve, and Awaken to unlock their true potential.
- Diverse Roles for each Masters & Servants: Attack, Defense, Support, Healer.

■ Devise and Strategize
- Your Master is the key of your Crusade, customize your Master's Skills for every battle.
- Unleash Combo Skills powerful beyond measure with perfect Master and Servant pairings.
- Customize your Rune Combination to gain unique Set Effects.
- Couple the various different Skills and Elements to assemble the most strategic Crusade.

■ Heed the Savage Battlefield
- Pulverize your opponents in PvP mode to prove your power.
- Preserve your Towers! Defense is the first step in strategic combat.
- Challenge yourself to various dungeons and earn rare rewards. Godspeed!

■ An Eerie and Mysterious World
- Not just another RPG! Immerse yourself in a magical and mysterious fantasy world.
- Cute yet bizarre, uncanny yet charming! Masters and Servants are ready to accompany you on your journey.

* Heir of Light Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HeirofLightGAMEVIL
* Heir of Light Official Forum: https://m.gamevilusa.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?1896-English

▶Required Permission Guidelines
When using the app, we may ask permissions for access to provide the following services.

[Required Permission]
- Storage: The authority is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.

[Optional Permission]
- Phone: The authority is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
- Contacts: The authority is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

** This game is available in English.
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support: https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
summary: The acclaimed gothic fantasy RPG is finally here. Rule the Darkness.
title: HEIR OF LIGHT

comments: It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ 😃👍

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

This is definitely the best game I've downloaded! Can you please add some more weapon boxes all unlockable with one key? And put like guns and things in. Granny doesn't stay tranquilized long enough. BEST IDEA EVER!! Make it so there is a granny in the forest and go into another house with granny in.

Thus is the best thing since sliced bread! 😂😂 Its the best horror app ive ever played.. It is so deep.. really deep. Ive found all the secrets in one day. And let me tell you, Granny has a serious problem with bear traps.. 😂😂 Please keep up the good work! I beg you to nake more games like this! I LOVE GRANNY LOL  😆😂😍😗

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.
recentChanges: * Opportunity to get a bonus day (only Normal and Easy).

* Now you can drop items on beartraps to disarm them.
summary: Granny keeps you locked in her house.
title: Granny

description: Long before Gaia was shattered by the invasion of darkness, its people were drawn into a fierce war along faction lines. As humans, elves, and dwarves battle each other in an attempt to take over the planet, they each enlist the help of forces beyond their control. Dragons and dark magic are powerful weapons with unforeseen consequences. Who will emerge victorious? And what will become of Gaia's future?Hack, slash, and blast your way through a massive magical world, hold your own in real-time combat, destroy epic bosses, and so much more in Tales of Gaia. The planet's fate is in your hands.-Unique game engine provides brilliant 3D graphics and PC-level special effects -Roam across a large and immersive map with dynamically environments-Prove yourself in real-time co-op and PVP combat-Earn glory and rewards for defeating massive bosses -Join a guild and rise in the ranks of the Guild Wars-Begin your journey by casting your allegiance to one of the factions: Dwarf, Elf, or Human-Uncover the Shadowy Secrets of Gaia's Past and experience firsthand the legendary battle -Discover the sources of darkness that caused Gaia's collapse through face-offs with epic bossesVisit our official site to learn more about Tales of Gaia: http://gaia.snail.com/Join the Tales of Gaia's community and learn more on Facebook and our official forum. descriptionHTML:
Join a group of legendary heroes from history to test your skills in dynamic and strategic battles!
Utilize the unique skills each hero brings to the fight! Use your skills and wits to win battles! Expand your legacy!

Meet players from around the world to form alliances, enjoy chats, and fight battles!

[Features]
● Experience strategic battles with players around the globe
In First Hero, you can enjoy fierce strategic battles over various domains with players around the world.

● Enjoy the combat of Alliance Domain Conquests
Join forces with your allies to conquer domains through intense battles.

● Collect a vast roster of historical heroes
Collect heroes from different nations and eras in history to fight for you! Upgrade them, equip them, and unleash them onto the battlefield!

● Build and expand your forces
Build your forces by upgrading your castle, building facilities, summoning heroes, and training units!

● Expand your territory
Win battles with heroes, units, tactics, and weapons to conquer domains and expand your territory!

● Test your strategic prowess
In First Hero, battles are won through the strategic use of heroes’ skills, unit characteristics, tactics, and weapons.
Develop your own strategies to best your opponent!

● Make it to the top ranks
Earn Ranking Points through player vs. player, alliance vs. alliance battles and make it to the top!
You can earn rewards based on your rank.

● Chat with players from all around the world in multiple languages
You can chat with other users in 한국어, English, Français, Deutsch, português.
Share your experience in real time with players from around the world!

● Adventure
Are you stressed out after all those PvP battles? Do you need more resources? Then jump into Adventure mode for single player action!
Adventure mode comes with different difficulty levels, and completing them provides with additional
resources!

● Fountain of Wishes
Make a wish at the Fountain of Wishes to earn a variety of resources!

First Hero is a free-to-play game with in-app purchases. You can purchase paid items in game, for which you will be charged for the set amounts.
Event items or some other items may not be refundable. Please check the terms before finalizing your
purchase.

By downloading this game, you agree to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: http://www.webzen.com/Rules/PrivacyPolicy-Mobile

comments: I think it OK I like it. I just think you should go through and check the words again. A few words were miss spelt for example HAPPENED HAS 1 N and SEDUCTION doesn't have a K also AUSTRALIA has 1 L. I found a few other words but can't remember them all. Just go through and check but beside that it's a great idea for a game cause it gets the mind going well done.🖒

Words are a bit too easy. They're ok if you're learning English but for us English speakers they're too simple. I suppose though it depends on whether you're a good speller or not. Still, it'd keep me amused whilst sitting on a bus or a train. It IS  a very good way to begin learning English though. 4 stars if there were more variety. Ye the ads are a damn nuisance. It's true it's a speed thing more than a spelling test. So if you're ancient, like me, it Does help the ol brain box think faster.

Way too many ads, for one thing. Also, since I'm a pretty good speller and move through the various games rather quickly, I feel that the listed "Top 20" scores are unrealistic, some reaching 5 to 6 figures. Can someone explain this to me?

It is the ever best game of mine. We can learn here many things . Before exam or test all the teachers regularly saying that you must learn all the difficult spellings.  It will help us . So my appeal to all the people who want to make their brain very intelligent  . So please install this attractive game .
Not bad. Confusing Leaderboard tho. Have to actually move your eye muscles to look for the right name or time of when you played.  Damn I sound like my brother!!

It is a fun game, in fact the game ideas are phenomenal. However, the ads pop up while I am actually playing the game. To top that off, every time I try to go back to the games, it repeats the previous game I did or goes into another ad and freezes at the end. Removing the game for those reasons.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases.

Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!

Go for highscores!

Game modes:
- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!
- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!
- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!
- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!
- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!
- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!
- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!
- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).

Scoring & limits:
- your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get
- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives
- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu

Features:

* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages
* 7 different spelling games
* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode
* Review all the words you played with in each game
* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode
* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!
* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks
* Each game is different
* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included
* A must game for all the spelling bee fans
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Have a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:
Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/
Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
recentChanges: * Added a PRACTICE mode in which you can practice spelling with no limits (no lives, no time limit)
* Please rate and review the game if you want to support it and want to see more and mainly free features. Thank you!
summary: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational word game for all ages!
title: Spelling Master - Free

description: A new game in the series: Ice Craft : Winter Crafting and Survival give players updated sandbox in "craft and build" style. The new craft system of game resources, armor, items, single player mode is a Classic and Survival.Cubic world of endless possibilities and exciting adventures. Easily place the building blocks you wish to place and build or craft anything you can imagine.Create whatever you want with the new system of craft and build items from blocks, ores, and other resources that you can find in the vastness of the game world. The crafting system simple and adapted for mobile devices.Create unique houses, decorate them for the holiday with various elements of decor and interior in the style of Ice Craft. Cultivate a pumpkin and show the whole city what you are waiting for this holiday.Explore all places of the world of crafting and building ,collect resources, build tools and weapons,ensure yourself complete protection from predators and monsters.Create your own worlds and upload to Multiplayer mode for crafting and building exploration by others.Play with your friends in real time!Features Unlike other series:- Completely new system for creating objects in winter craft .- New blocks and items in the winter craft game in a medieval style.- Many variation of armor and weapons for your winter craft player.- A special shop with unique weapons and elite armor for winter craft .- Bed for sleep, day/night cycle, weather, player inventory and stats for build .- Daily bonuses.- And that's not all!Build shelter, fight, grow, the only limit is your imagination!
descriptionHTML:
A new game in the series: Ice Craft : Winter Crafting and Survival give players updated sandbox in "craft and build" style. The new craft system of game resources, armor, items, single player mode is a Classic and Survival.
Cubic world of endless possibilities and exciting adventures. Easily place the building blocks you wish to place and build or craft anything you can imagine.
Create whatever you want with the new system of craft and build items from blocks, ores, and other resources that you can find in the vastness of the game world. The crafting system simple and adapted for mobile devices.

Create unique houses, decorate them for the holiday with various elements of decor and interior in the style of Ice Craft. Cultivate a pumpkin and show the whole city what you are waiting for this holiday.

Explore all places of the world of crafting and building ,collect resources, build tools and weapons,
ensure yourself complete protection from predators and monsters.
Create your own worlds and upload to Multiplayer mode for crafting and building exploration by others.Play with your friends in real time!

Features Unlike other series:
- Completely new system for creating objects in winter craft .
- New blocks and items in the winter craft game in a medieval style.
- Many variation of armor and weapons for your winter craft player.
- A special shop with unique weapons and elite armor for winter craft .
- Bed for sleep, day/night cycle, weather, player inventory and stats for build .
- Daily bonuses.
- And that's not all!

Build shelter, fight, grow, the only limit is your imagination!
summary: Ice Craft is a Winter crafting and building game with beautiful 3D graphics.
title: Ice craft : Winter crafting and building

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

descriptionHTML:
World War 1945

World War 1945 is an exciting, new foray into the field of mobile war games. Airborne operations, landing operations, tanks and munitions, battleships and carriers, air strikes and bombardments... utilize every single WWII element to devise your own strategies.
Pave the way to defeat the evil warmonger Pathos and compete with other players by using numerous arms and warship skills.

Note: World War 1945 is free to download and play, but some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please turn on authentication for purchases in the Google Play Store app.

Features:
-Build and upgrade various military facilities to gain access to new troops and weaponry.
-Experience famous WWII battlefields in Story Mode and claim various rewards.
-Feast your eyes upon vivid, dynamic graphics of the battlefields, soldiers, and weapons of WWII.
-Deploy historic tanks and armored vehicles of WWII to the battlefield including the Tiger and M4 Sherman.
-Construct 10+ types of warships including battleships, cruisers, destroyers, and aircraft carriers at the Navy Base.
-Install warship skills to large warships like the Missouri and Bismarck and legendary carriers like the Enterprise and Graf Zeppelin to enable fleet support abilities.
-Drop famed paratroopers like the Airborne Rangers and Fallschirmjäger to the enemy base and launch assaults from behind.
-Fortify your base with Sentry Towers and Bunkers; barricade it by planting Howitzers or even UHF Guns to protect your resources from other players.
-Modify and renew your defense facilities by giving them different weapons.
-Battle with other players and defeat them to join the higher league and earn greater rewards.

Join World War 1945, the one and only realistic WWII mobile game today. Train your troops, vanquish vicious enemies, and become the best commander in history.

description: The best car driving simulator game of 2018 comes with the most realistic driving physics, unlimited customization, huge open world, addictive gameplay and endless fun!★REAL DRIVING PHYSICSUltimate Car Driving Simulator combines the realism and fun driving physics to create the best car driving simulator on mobile with its advanced car driving physics engine. The best car driving simulator comes with the best driving physics! From racing cars to off road SUVs, all kinds of vehicles have their own physics!★UNLIMITED CUSTOMIZATIONCreate your own car and show off your style to everyone! From countless vinyls to car parts, you can create your own dream car with this game. Imagination is your only limit! description: In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened. Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain. Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!GAME FEATURES:• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!• Over 100 different food items! • Over 100 trophies to collect! • Unlimited play!Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!GAME MODES:• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress.   Customers are infinitely patient.• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master?  Put your food-making skills to the test!Available in 11 languages:  English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.
descriptionHTML:
In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened.

Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain.

Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!

GAME FEATURES:
• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!
• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
• Over 100 different food items!
• Over 100 trophies to collect!
• Unlimited play!

Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!

GAME MODES:

• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.

• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!

• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress. Customers are infinitely patient.

• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master? Put your food-making skills to the test!


Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.

description: Built on Unity 3D, Fantasy Blade displays a great Open World of Myth. Choose your favorite champion, start you adventurous journey, meet your side by side friends and create a new history. As a hot-blooded MMORPG mobile game, this grand and legendary game has all sorts of fierce PVP and PVE fighting. Weapons have no limitation for a specific class. Hundreds of weapons including Axe, Dual Blade, Bow and Fists can be switched immediately as per your need.[Features]- Grand Open World, Perfected for Mobile –Fantasy Blade is in a leading place in MMORPG, with detailed characters, fluid animations, large-scale maps and wonderful buildings. The brilliant 3D graphics and special effects put you right in the middle of the battle.- Advanced Weapon Switching Design – Unlike other games, Fantasy Blade has no limitation of class and weapon. As per your satisfaction and requirement, you can use any weapons you like. - Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles – Call up your powerful allies into a battle. Interact with friends and set special tactic against your opponents. Team up with your friends in a guild and soon you will create your own league. Fantasy Blade is the new happy hour for you and your mates.- Interesting Features for Spare Time –In Fantasy Blade, when you don’t want to have fierce conflict, just go to God’s Trial, Tower of Babel, BOSS Siege, relaxing Fishing and so on. Fresh funny events will kill your boring time. - Intense Live PVP Experience– 1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and glory!COMMUNITYVisit our official Facebook page and community for the latest news and announcements:Facebook: www.facebook.com/FantasyBladeEmail: customerservice@rastargames.comOfficial Page: ftb.rastargames.com

comments: I love the game!! Thank you so much! It's just what I wanted to relax! so far I play it every day! The 80s neon style is great! I can't wait to see how the game grows! The graphics are well done too! I personally would like to see more trippy lights and colours  reacting to the velocity and frequencies of the songs and  perhaps a bit more speed! Maybe a bit more anti-gravity with some corkscrews and loop de loops, jumps..y'know that sort of thing!Keep it up guys, looking forward to seeing what happens next :D
I would've liked to play it but it says it only supports mp3

What an amazing update! I've followed this game since the first time it's launch, and it's getting better and better. Would be much more impressive if you can add Quick Play mode (random race on random music) and an option for premium mode which you can remove the ads (I know you have to earn something from your hard work, but can you consider this? Cuz I'd definitely buy the premium option). Please consider those two and thanks a lot for your amazing work.

[ new review ] The update which was released yesterday has improve the game by quite alot. Still, it'd be awesome to see more improvement to see more improvement on this game [ old review ] This is one of the best game with high quality graphic. Everything in this game is smooth. However. There's too manything thats going on in the screen. It hard to know what to dodge and what to collect. There's no time to react to stuff. Still the graphic can hide it away. But it has turn the game into an uneasy situation.

I love it! I was looking for a game like this a few weeks back, but gave up. Along comes this, with a FANTASTIC 80s vibe! That's just my speed! My only suggestion is that there should be lanes, because I can't quite tell where the points are until they're right in front of me. It makes it hard to plan moves. However, it certainly isn't anything to get you less than five stars. Bravo! P.s: for any Duran Duran fans out there, "the reflex" works BEAUTIFULLY.

I think this game is marvelous but I do think there should be more to it like multiplayer maybe? I also found that I played the retro map more than the first one cause it just made me feel sick and I couldnt see the light cubes properly and it just felt abit too hectic. I also think that the levels should flow better if u get what I mean like flow better with the song. Don't get me wrong though this is a great game but this is just a little bit of constructive criticism

You need to buy them because they only give you one a day!! And you need 80 or more to level up things. So spend that money you dont have!! This game is a HUGE MONEY PIT!! You have been warned!!!

Update: have played nearly a year and a half now. Game is fun, graphics good, addicting. You can play without spending one cent, and still have fun.  Good game for killing time or if you really want to invest... many levels and special events await. And the game actually doesn't have many glitches in it to be a bother. Liking on Facebook, one can actually hear from the game people about problems. That's a big plus.   Comment from 6/2016: Level too high for me to rate it any better. Can't rate what I can't see. You might wait to make rating it a mission until the level required to play it has been reached

I played this game for 18 months. Was very far in the game. Then they wanted me to do an upgrade. Afterwards I could not get back into the game at all. So I uninstalled and reinstalled it. I ended up having to start all over again. Most games will let you pick back up where you left off in case you get a new phone. This game does not. Other than that is a game of patience unless you have 1000.00 to put into it to advance quickly. It is relaxing to play for the most part. Kids might like it. It teaches how to be wise with money.

Seem to have issues and when I report them and send screenshots, your answer to all the issues is " clear your cashe and reboot".  Not impressed.  Upset is what I am.  I am not irrelevant.  And what I present to your tech support shouldn't be disregarded.

I really love this game!!!! I cnt wait for you to make number 3 cause I love this game. Been playing it since it 1st came out. I would like to buy it as well. I would to know why it's so hard to log in on fb and sign in as well wen ur already logged in. Please fix please fix.

Other than the "cannot connect to server" being a recurrent glitch when challenges are having bonus days or you are stupid enough to spend real money on timed competition  boosters...... description: The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world!  You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity.  The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!REVIEWS:‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/) ‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com) ‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)KEY FEATURES:✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy! ✔ Simple, intuitive controls. ✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay. descriptionHTML:
The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world! You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity. The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!

REVIEWS:
‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/)
‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com)
‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)

KEY FEATURES:
✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy!
✔ Simple, intuitive controls.
✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!
✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.
✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.
✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.
✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.
✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!

The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay.

description: "Simple, squashy and with plenty of just-one-more-go addictiveness." – The Guardian"Microtrip offers a dose of happiness to cheer you up on a miserable afternoon." – Pocket GamerMicrotrip is a physics arcade game set inside the body of a strange creature. Its unique soft-body physics and the procedural generated levels make the game different and challenging every time you play.The goal is simple: go as deep as possible. For completing such a task you need to dodge the monsters as well as eating the white cells that are keeping you alive. The game is punctuated by special pills that give the blob a weird yet amazing power. How far can you go?Packed with cool features:- Realistic soft-body physics- Google Play leaderboards- Two control schemes: tilt or touch- Awesome super bonus pills- Procedurally generated levels
descriptionHTML:
"Simple, squashy and with plenty of just-one-more-go addictiveness." – The Guardian

"Microtrip offers a dose of happiness to cheer you up on a miserable afternoon." – Pocket Gamer

Microtrip is a physics arcade game set inside the body of a strange creature. Its unique soft-body physics and the procedural generated levels make the game different and challenging every time you play.

The goal is simple: go as deep as possible. For completing such a task you need to dodge the monsters as well as eating the white cells that are keeping you alive. The game is punctuated by special pills that give the blob a weird yet amazing power. How far can you go?

Packed with cool features:
- Realistic soft-body physics
- Google Play leaderboards
- Two control schemes: tilt or touch
- Awesome super bonus pills
- Procedurally generated levels
summary: Simple and cheerful little physics-based arcade game
title: Microtrip

description: ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)[HOW TO PLAY]• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.• Just tap the line to remove the wire.[FEATURES]• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!• Play without any limit or restriction!- No lives or No energy.- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!• Simple and Intuitive Design- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.• Highly Optimized Gameplay!- Very light on your device! Download Now!- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.
descriptionHTML:
ALL LIGHT is a connection puzzle game that will exercise your brain as Brain Teasers and improve your creativity by solving each puzzle. Test yourself. ;)


[HOW TO PLAY]
• Link the battery to the light bulbs to turn them ON!
• Connect bulbs (lamps) with battery to turn on them.
• Turn on all bulbs by connecting with energy source to solve each puzzle.
• Each bulb shows the number of wires required to turn it on.
• A red light bulb means that the wires are connected more than necessary.
• Just tap the line to remove the wire.


[FEATURES]
• Simple but innovative linking puzzle!
- Playing is as simple as just touching the screen.
- Challenge the higher packages that will gradually get harder!

• Play without any limit or restriction!
- No lives or No energy.
- Follow your own pace and enjoy freely this linking puzzle as much as you want!

• Simple and Intuitive Design
- Men and Women of all ages can enjoy this game. Feel the satisfaction of the lights turning ON.

• Highly Optimized Gameplay!
- Very light on your device! Download Now!
- No need to use internet data while playing. Enjoy this linking puzzle whenever and wherever.

description: Kitchen story is an addictive fun cooking game, where anyone can cook all kinds of dishes. Own you’re food court, cook food and serve customers as quick as possible to earn maximum profits.  It tests your time & resource management skills. Travel the word and explore varieties of recipes and beat different chefs around the globe. You will absolutely love the gossips and challenges of the chefs, download it now! Kitchen story: Diner Cafe is an addictive restaurant story game where you open a classy cafe and serve customers delicious recipes. Serve coffee, cook bakery items and more, and immerse yourself in an addictive restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.Kitchen story: Diner Cafe has lots of Recipes & Stories inside a casual game! Gossip & compete with cafe chefs in a story mode that is so deliciously addictive for girls, you’ll never want to put it down! Become a world chef and build your bakery, cafe, diner or restaurant with cooking the best food and drinks in a story game that lets you play your way. Exciting features in this restaurant simulator lets you:   • Build and scramble a diner, bakery, or restaurant    • Open cafes & compete chefs at different locations with great ambience– Be the brightest Cafe on the street.   • Use Power-ups and Booster for more efficient time-management!   • Develop your own serving strategy to maximize your profit and thrive in Cafeland game.   • Bring your restaurant to life with impactful stories and colourful customers for kids and adults.    • Upgrade your Appliances to speed up the food line!   • Gossip with chefs & each story is unique at Diner Cafe!   • Play in English, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish, Thai & Indonesian!Features:Cafe & Restaurant Simulator   • Own Cozy kitchens across different locations   • Make a business paradise at your cafe by taking big risks & serving correctly.Cafe Treats & Bakery Sweets   • Coffee mania, desserts, dinners, and hot drinks for restaurant fans from crazy kitchen!   • Bakery treats and restaurant eats!   • Savor hours of content with 300+ levels in over 7 unique Locations, and look for new Levels added regularly!My Restaurant, My cooking diner Story:      Story mode with unique characters and meaningful relationships. Beat each competitor, a world class chef, and experience your own restaurant adventure in this nice life simulator so as to Rise as super chef.Time management cooking games fans from all over the world have already started their restaurant story & loved this game.If you like our work, please like us on Facebook, to offer you better games. FOLLOW US at facebook.com/appongames ---------------------------------------------IMPORTANT CONSUMER INFORMATION:Kitchen Story respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information.We do require a few additional Permissions to function:1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGEThese permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new kitchen areas / competitors.2) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATEThis permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new game content for new kitchen locations / competitors.Kitchen Story is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money to enhance your gameplay.Game may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.---------------------------------------------

Kitchen Story respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not allow you share this information.

We do require a few additional Permissions to function:

1) READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE & WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
These permissions are needed to read/write data of downloaded content for new kitchen areas / competitors.

2) ACCESS_WIFI_STATE & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
This permission is required to check internet connectivity to download new game content for new kitchen locations / competitors
.
Kitchen Story is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money to enhance your gameplay.

Game may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

comments: Only problem I have is an overabundance of chests that you get stuck with and can't possibly open them all on time and it makes you lose out on getting gold chests or Diamond chests. It would be really nice if you can choose to dump any of the chests you don't want. Or swap out the ones you have in stock for the newly acquired better ones after a ranked match. Other than that, awesome game

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont
