description: Trying to learn all the parts of the body at once can be difficult. Learning about parts of the face is where children often begin in preschool. Once they have learned about the eyes, ears and mouth, they will begin learning about the arms and legs. At the grade school level, children begin to learn about the interior anatomy. Learning about how the heart and stomach work and how each part of the body functions is a key part of this subject.Children will begin to learn different types of science vocabulary that relates to learning anatomy. These vocabulary words may be foreign to them and they may need to practice spelling the words and practice the meanings. Children love to learn about themselves and they will enjoy this subject.The lesson is divided into 5 animated sub-lessons in which kids will learn the names of different body parts and their uses. Each lesson will be followed by 3 sets of practice games. These games will help kids practice and reinforce their concept of body parts through labeling, matching, crossword and identification exercises.Enjoy With FANTASTIC FUN...
descriptionHTML:
Trying to learn all the parts of the body at once can be difficult. Learning about parts of the face is where children often begin in preschool. Once they have learned about the eyes, ears and mouth, they will begin learning about the arms and legs. At the grade school level, children begin to learn about the interior anatomy.

Learning about how the heart and stomach work and how each part of the body functions is a key part of this subject.

Children will begin to learn different types of science vocabulary that relates to learning anatomy. These vocabulary words may be foreign to them and they may need to practice spelling the words and practice the meanings. Children love to learn about themselves and they will enjoy this subject.

The lesson is divided into 5 animated sub-lessons in which kids will learn the names of different body parts and their uses. Each lesson will be followed by 3 sets of practice games. These games will help kids practice and reinforce their concept of body parts through labeling, matching, crossword and identification exercises.

Enjoy With FANTASTIC FUN...
summary: Body Parts is an interactive educational lesson and game for kindergarteners.
title: Basic Skill Learning Human Body Parts

description: Past and present, myth and reality collide in Igpaw: Intramuros, an alternate/augmented reality game about Philippine history!igpaw: to jump above in order to reach for, or go beyond, something.History Unravels!Intramuros, the City Behind the Walls, was the historical heart of Manila—the seat of government, church, and culture, and stomping ground of some of Philippine history’s heroes, villains, and fantastical characters. Today, Intramuros is threatened. An unknown force is displacing these people from the past, and only you can save them. Alternate Reality!Walk Intramuros’ streets to a parallel reality guided by Crispin, an altar boy from our national hero’s novel Noli Me Tangere; Fray Domingo, a ghost in search of his head; and a daligmata, a fantastic creature both wise and benevolent. Augmented Reality Adventure Game!In this old-school adventure game with a twist, pierce the veil of time and reality with your mobile device. Scan Intramuros’ historical markers to activate game segments. Orient your device towards historic figures and click to interact with them. Pan your device up, down, left, and right to search the surroundings for lost in-game items and return them to their rightful owners. Solve a variety of logic puzzles and reach out to historical figures from diverse time periods, such as Mother Ignacia, General Douglas MacArthur, Rajah Sulayman, Pope John Paul II, and Jose Rizal, to heal the rift and restore peace in Intramuros.Igpaw: Intramuros. Jump past the walls!——IMPORTANT INFORMATION:1. By downloading, installing, or using Igpaw: Intramuros, you agree to be bound by the End-User License Agreement, available here: http://penoy.admu.edu.ph/~alls/archives/35032. Due to the game’s use of 3-D graphics, augmented reality and real-time location detection, the recommended specifications to run this game is a high-end Android phone or tablet (dual-core 1.2 GHz or better), with back-facing camera, GPS, digital compass and/or gyroscope and at least 0.8GB of RAM. We cannot guarantee functionality on lower-end devices.
descriptionHTML:
Past and present, myth and reality collide in Igpaw: Intramuros, an alternate/augmented reality game about Philippine history!

igpaw: to jump above in order to reach for, or go beyond, something.

History Unravels!
Intramuros, the City Behind the Walls, was the historical heart of Manila—the seat of government, church, and culture, and stomping ground of some of Philippine history’s heroes, villains, and fantastical characters. Today, Intramuros is threatened. An unknown force is displacing these people from the past, and only you can save them.

Alternate Reality!
Walk Intramuros’ streets to a parallel reality guided by Crispin, an altar boy from our national hero’s novel Noli Me Tangere; Fray Domingo, a ghost in search of his head; and a daligmata, a fantastic creature both wise and benevolent.

Augmented Reality Adventure Game!
In this old-school adventure game with a twist, pierce the veil of time and reality with your mobile device. Scan Intramuros’ historical markers to activate game segments. Orient your device towards historic figures and click to interact with them. Pan your device up, down, left, and right to search the surroundings for lost in-game items and return them to their rightful owners. Solve a variety of logic puzzles and reach out to historical figures from diverse time periods, such as Mother Ignacia, General Douglas MacArthur, Rajah Sulayman, Pope John Paul II, and Jose Rizal, to heal the rift and restore peace in Intramuros.

Igpaw: Intramuros. Jump past the walls!

——
IMPORTANT INFORMATION:
1. By downloading, installing, or using Igpaw: Intramuros, you agree to be bound by the End-User License Agreement, available here: http://penoy.admu.edu.ph/~alls/archives/3503
2. Due to the game’s use of 3-D graphics, augmented reality and real-time location detection, the recommended specifications to run this game is a high-end Android phone or tablet (dual-core 1.2 GHz or better), with back-facing camera, GPS, digital compass and/or gyroscope and at least 0.8GB of RAM. We cannot guarantee functionality on lower-end devices.
developer: Ateneo Laboratory for the Learning Sciences

Great fighting game with lots of characters and abilities. The main fights are very fun, good mix of effort and strategy. description: Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes & Super Villains in the ultimate cosmic showdown! Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate Marvel Champion!WELCOME TO THE CONTEST:Captain America vs. Iron Man! Hulk vs. Wolverine! Spider-Man vs. Deadpool! The greatest battles in Marvel history are in your hands! The greedy Elder of the Universe known as The Collector has summoned you to a brawl of epic proportions against a line-up of vile villains including Thanos, Kang the Conqueror, and many more! Experience the ultimate free-to-play fighting game on your mobile device…Marvel Contest of Champions! SUIT UP WITH FRIENDS:• Team up with your friends and other Summoners to build the strongest Alliance• Strategize with your alliance, help them keep their Champions in the fight• Battle to the top in Alliance Events and take on Alliance Quest Series together in specially designed quest maps to earn exclusive Alliance rewards• Test your Alliance’s mettle by battling it out with Alliances from around the world in Alliance Wars! BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM OF CHAMPIONS:• Assemble a mighty team of heroes and villains (choosing Champions such as: Iron Man, Hulk, Wolverine, Storm, Star-Lord, Gamora, Spider-Man, Deadpool, Magneto and Winter Soldier)• Embark on quests to defeat Kang and Thanos and face the challenge of a mysterious new super powerful cosmic competitor, ultimately to prevent the total destruction of The Marvel Universe• Improve your team’s offense and defense with multiple Mastery trees COLLECT THE MIGHTIEST SUPER HEROES (AND VILLAINS!):• Collect, level up, and manage your teams of heroes and villains wisely to receive synergy bonuses based upon team affiliation and relationships taken from the pages of Marvel Comics• Pairing up Black Panther and Storm or Cyclops and Wolverine for bonuses, or making a team of Guardians of the Galaxy for a team affiliation bonus• The more powerful the Champion, the better their stats, abilities and special moves will be• New Champions are being added to The Contest all the time! QUEST AND BATTLE:• Journey through an exciting storyline in classic Marvel storytelling fashion• Fight it out with a huge array of heroes and villains in iconic locations spanning the Marvel Universe such as: Avengers Tower, Oscorp, The Kyln, Wakanda, The Savage Land, Asgard, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, and more!• Explore dynamic quest maps and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting utilizing controls developed specifically for the mobile platform Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MarvelContestofChampionsSubscribe on YouTube: www.youtube.com/MarvelChampionsFollow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/MarvelChampionsFollow us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/marvelchampionswww.playcontestofchampions.com
descriptionHTML:
Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes & Super Villains in the ultimate cosmic showdown! Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate Marvel Champion!

WELCOME TO THE CONTEST:
Captain America vs. Iron Man! Hulk vs. Wolverine! Spider-Man vs. Deadpool! The greatest battles in Marvel history are in your hands! The greedy Elder of the Universe known as The Collector has summoned you to a brawl of epic proportions against a line-up of vile villains including Thanos, Kang the Conqueror, and many more! Experience the ultimate free-to-play fighting game on your mobile device…Marvel Contest of Champions!

SUIT UP WITH FRIENDS:
• Team up with your friends and other Summoners to build the strongest Alliance
• Strategize with your alliance, help them keep their Champions in the fight
• Battle to the top in Alliance Events and take on Alliance Quest Series together in specially designed quest maps to earn exclusive Alliance rewards
• Test your Alliance’s mettle by battling it out with Alliances from around the world in Alliance Wars!

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM OF CHAMPIONS:
• Assemble a mighty team of heroes and villains (choosing Champions such as: Iron Man, Hulk, Wolverine, Storm, Star-Lord, Gamora, Spider-Man, Deadpool, Magneto and Winter Soldier)
• Embark on quests to defeat Kang and Thanos and face the challenge of a mysterious new super powerful cosmic competitor, ultimately to prevent the total destruction of The Marvel Universe
• Improve your team’s offense and defense with multiple Mastery trees

COLLECT THE MIGHTIEST SUPER HEROES (AND VILLAINS!):
• Collect, level up, and manage your teams of heroes and villains wisely to receive synergy bonuses based upon team affiliation and relationships taken from the pages of Marvel Comics
• Pairing up Black Panther and Storm or Cyclops and Wolverine for bonuses, or making a team of Guardians of the Galaxy for a team affiliation bonus
• The more powerful the Champion, the better their stats, abilities and special moves will be
• New Champions are being added to The Contest all the time!

QUEST AND BATTLE:
• Journey through an exciting storyline in classic Marvel storytelling fashion
• Fight it out with a huge array of heroes and villains in iconic locations spanning the Marvel Universe such as: Avengers Tower, Oscorp, The Kyln, Wakanda, The Savage Land, Asgard, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, and more!
• Explore dynamic quest maps and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting utilizing controls developed specifically for the mobile platform

Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MarvelContestofChampions
Subscribe on YouTube: www.youtube.com/MarvelChampions
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/MarvelChampions
Follow us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/marvelchampions
www.playcontestofchampions.com

Check out the full list of updates on the MCoC blog: playcontestofchampions.com/news
summary: The biggest names from the Marvel Universe are ready to battle!

description: Hello, all quiz lovers! We are introducing a brand new educational quiz trivia game that could easily become your favorite math quiz! “Math All Levels Quiz Game” is an amazing math trivia quiz that can help you become a real math solver and learn the most important maths formulas. Brain teasers are fun and can be a very useful tool while preparing for school classes. This is one of the best educational math games to help you do some math practice and solve some math puzzles! Tons of quiz trivia questions are what you will find in this awesome free math trivia! Learning has never been so fun! The most awesome way to discover math is fun and  practice some mathematics with a cool new game.* Choose one of 4 offered answers;* There are 5 levels of difficulty in the endless “math quiz questions and answers”;*  Give the answer quickly and win extra points for being fast;* If you give 3 incorrect answers, you will have to start again;* Log in with Facebook and win free coins, check the leaderboard and beat the high score;* If you have problems answering quiz questions, you can ask for 3 types of help:1) 50:50 – remove two incorrect answers;2) Switch your question with another one;3) Use the help of your friends – take a look at their answers shown in percents.Download Math All Levels Quiz Game for free and find out the answers to many questions that have to do with this popular topic! Learning is nothing but fun with “free games for education”! Find out maths solutions for any question with one of the best fun educational games. Now you can have fun while answering interesting math quiz questions and check how familiar you are with one of the most popular school subjects, and all that while taking a “knowledge quiz” on your smartphones and tablets! If you're interested in getting to know all the answers in this fun “free trivia quiz for kids”, and you love playing brain teaser games and taking educational trivia quizzes, this is the perfect “maths quiz” for you! An amazing family fun quiz  is now at the palm of your hand! Play a cool new game and become a real math master at the same time!Educate yourself about this popular topic and learn without reading tiresome books or taking private classes! Prepare for your school classes and show your friends how good you are at math! This is a fun and educational trivia game for all those who want to learn and have fun at the same time! Take this entertaining educational quiz app and test your knowledge on math! Learning is interesting with “free quizzes for education”! Now you have all you ever needed and wanted to know about math facts and all levels of mathematics at your disposal 24/7! Don't miss the chance to grab this amazing free math app and enjoy the world of fun and learning!Start your quiz quest even today and enjoy having fun with your friends and family! Try to answer all the “trivia quiz questions” and you'll get an insight into your level of math knowledge! Spend some happy hours playing this great “math app for kids” and invite all your friends and family members to the ultimate math competition!! description: Orcwar RTS is the best strategy game for Mobile12 Missions in SinglePlayer for this rts.Create your army with 9 types of characters:- Peon allows to collect the Gold or to cut some wood- Warrior will protect you from attacks opponents in the hand-to-hand fights.- Archer send arrows on your opponents- Brut will resist more than your Warrior and will impose more powerful knocks- Gort use 2 weapons to attack and fastest- Tank cashes the knocks as the person- Spy allows to explore quickly- Mage sends spells on your opponents- Kaz is the most crazy, he blows up on your opponents, a real KamikazeCreate your buildings to improve your village:- Hute allows to shelter your units, every Hute can contain 15 units- Tower is a tower which will protect your village of the enemy attacks.- SawMill will allow you to unlock Archers and Tank.- Cauldron will bring to the unlock magician- Forge to create strong OrcsClash of Orc RTS
descriptionHTML:
Orcwar RTS is the best strategy game for Mobile

12 Missions in SinglePlayer for this rts.

Create your army with 9 types of characters:
- Peon allows to collect the Gold or to cut some wood
- Warrior will protect you from attacks opponents in the hand-to-hand fights.
- Archer send arrows on your opponents
- Brut will resist more than your Warrior and will impose more powerful knocks
- Gort use 2 weapons to attack and fastest
- Tank cashes the knocks as the person
- Spy allows to explore quickly
- Mage sends spells on your opponents
- Kaz is the most crazy, he blows up on your opponents, a real Kamikaze

Create your buildings to improve your village:
- Hute allows to shelter your units, every Hute can contain 15 units
- Tower is a tower which will protect your village of the enemy attacks.
- SawMill will allow you to unlock Archers and Tank.
- Cauldron will bring to the unlock magician
- Forge to create strong Orcs

Clash of Orc RTS
summary: Strategy game, build your village, create Warrior of Empire, civilization RTS
title: OrcWar Clash RTS

description: From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGRCreate the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!Features:● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!● Free updates!● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!Mechanic Pig● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!● All you have to do is pilot it!● Tweak his design to get all three stars!New Episode: The Road to El PorkadoEmbark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!Get ready to see pigs fly!Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:http://facebook.com/badpiggiesFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/badpiggiesTerms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyImportant Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

description: Pocket War is a turn base mobile game with elfin cultivation, collection and strategy battle. There are more than 500 lovely elfins in the game, what’s more, also have unique evolution system, various gorgeous skills and brand new scene. Interact with friends to cultivate, speed up to adventure and also have tactics arena element here for you. New and old players can have fun in this game.[Elfin Cultivation]In the game, players can collect various elfins freely, cultivate them and evolve to stronger elfins for you in battle and arena.[Strategy Battle]Enter battleground through tactics deployment and have a odds-on battle.[Obtain Resource Quickly]Obtain abundant resource through unique friends speed up system, so that you can cultivate your elfin quickly.[Various Element]Abundant events, interesting tasks, Pokemon Palace, Resource War, Void Realm, Legendary Reveland, Trainer House etc. no matter the leisure or arena players, all they can find the plays and fun which are suitable for them.
descriptionHTML:
Pocket War is a turn base mobile game with elfin cultivation, collection and strategy battle. There are more than 500 lovely elfins in the game, what’s more, also have unique evolution system, various gorgeous skills and brand new scene. Interact with friends to cultivate, speed up to adventure and also have tactics arena element here for you. New and old players can have fun in this game.
[Elfin Cultivation]
In the game, players can collect various elfins freely, cultivate them and evolve to stronger elfins for you in battle and arena.
[Strategy Battle]
Enter battleground through tactics deployment and have a odds-on battle.
[Obtain Resource Quickly]
Obtain abundant resource through unique friends speed up system, so that you can cultivate your elfin quickly.
[Various Element]
Abundant events, interesting tasks, Pokemon Palace, Resource War, Void Realm, Legendary Reveland, Trainer House etc. no matter the leisure or arena players, all they can find the plays and fun which are suitable for them.
summary: Hunderds of cute pets collocating randomly,fighting freely
title: Pocket War

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I'm rating this high because I've played it before and I absolutely love it. However, I cannot currently trying get it to load. I get the initial splash screen and it says 'Building camp...' The loading bar fills and then.... Nothing. It just hangs there forever. I've tried clearing cache and reinstalling. Any ideas? I'd love to play again.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

I have this game, and I play this more than watching the actual show. You can bring together a motley crew of survivors for missions and get gear to make them stronger. Build a camp, in order to multiply resources, because you will need them to improve other buildings. Also, to note, this game will not allow you to get stronger unless you improve your camp. I have survivors who cannot level up until I Improve the council. The training grounds will not be built any further unless you improve the council. Its like a city/fort building game with tactical rpg feel to it.  There is a leaderboard, that actually awards you for being at a certain tier. You can join guilds to help get better gear. I love this game!  ...The con that I have with this is that every time of logging on, deals are thrown in my face, and it is enticing too.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.
description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

For player support, please visit:
nextgames.helpshift.com
recentChanges: The Walking Dead Season 8 missions continue every Monday! Watch the episode, play through the memorable moments the next day in No Man’s Land and earn Rick tokens along the way.
Gather your guild and explore the new “In the Dead of Night” challenge.
The update includes many bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: Play AMC’s The Walking Dead! Complete Episode 1 and unlock Daryl to your team!
title: The Walking Dead No Man's Land

description: In this game you have to drift inside a circle and you should avoid to hit obstacles.Tap once to select a center where your car will drift around and don’t hit the roadside. When you want to stop drifting you just have to tap again on the screen. Sometimes there are barricades inside the circle so watch out. The barrels which are on the street move everytime, when you have solved a passage, more to the center. The car also accelerates with the time. There are two gamemodes:-	Easy: Very big circles and a very low probability of barricades inside the circle-	Hard: Very small circles and a very high probability of barricades inside the circle For every solved circle you will get 1 Point in easy mode and 3 Points in hard mode.  These points will be added to your coin balance. With these coins you can buy new cars with different velocities, accelerations and sizes. Be the drifting king!!!Follow us on: - Twitter: @xarpetApps
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to drift inside a circle and you should avoid to hit obstacles.

Tap once to select a center where your car will drift around and don’t hit the roadside. When you want to stop drifting you just have to tap again on the screen. Sometimes there are barricades inside the circle so watch out. The barrels which are on the street move everytime, when you have solved a passage, more to the center. The car also accelerates with the time.

There are two gamemodes:
- Easy: Very big circles and a very low probability of barricades inside the circle
- Hard: Very small circles and a very high probability of barricades inside the circle

For every solved circle you will get 1 Point in easy mode and 3 Points in hard mode. These points will be added to your coin balance. With these coins you can buy new cars with different velocities, accelerations and sizes.

Be the drifting king!!!

Follow us on:
- Twitter: @xarpetApps

description: The running expert fish hero is back and he welcomes you to the world of fish running! The app Run Fish Run 2 will take you to the world of endless fish run at your fingertips. It is an out an out entertaining running game with lots of twists and tweaks, which is fun to play buy obviously challenging to master. Like adults kids will love to play this fish runner game for simple but addictive game play, easy game control, and amazing aqua world around!How to play the game!     The game play is based on endless running frenzy of the hero Fish on the 3-lane water track. You have to help the fish hero to run, dash, dodge and jump obstacles, collect coins from the running track, and to stay safe from naughty enemies like grumpy hippo, hungry crocodile, angry bird, attacking machines, grouchy boats, etc.   More distance the fish covers and more coins he collect, will decide your performance level and score in your account. comments: I do enjoy this kind of game. I've completed thousands of screens worth with blendoku and i love hue, both of which played all the way through at least twice.  This game is basically the same ( more i love hue-ish) and I love that one can look at the pattern after completion, if one wants (instead of instantly moving to next puzzle).  Big downside for me is sickly yellow background.  Black or neutral gray, please!!!  For a color puzzle, a terrible look!!

This game is the perfect time killer, and the producers of this game are so polite: "hi, we hope you enjoy the game :)" how can you dislike a game like this?? And it gives you free backgrounds! I'm so glad I stole my brother's phone that time otherwise I probably wouldn't have found this game. 5 stars for sureeee :)

Never have i been so into a phone game for years since the early angry bird or where's the water. This game is so relaxing, playing this gives me the same feeling as i do my meditation. Stress relief. The finished color patterns are beautiful too
As a game developer myself I wholeheartedly believe this is a masterpiece in design. Anyone could pick it up and learn at their own phase.  Great job, simple concept with excellent execution!
I love it's creativity (but not so much the ads) yet still a game worth playing. 5 out 5 ☆
Love this game, was happily playing it for hours before I realised there's only 150 levels- my only criticism for this game is it needs to have unlimited levels!

Best game ever!!! The fourth and final installment of the five nights at Freddy's series is the best one! So, basically you're a kid who is trapped in his room and you have to make it to 6AM without being jumpscared by any of the nightmarish animatronics. There are little freddles that will occasionally pop up on your bed, and you shoo them with your flashlight. Do this and Freddy won't ruin your fun. Check the closet door for foxy or he will get you. If you hear breathing, then check the doors. If someone is there, shut it.

Amazing series. You are simply an amazing developer, Scott. You pump out games like this even though there are so much haters you have to endure, I respect you. A great ending to a series, but I do know there's DLC. Anyways, congrats on the movie being made by the Warner Bros. 5 Stars all the way Scott. No sarcasm in case you thought, being serious about this review

description: NOTE: This game requires at least 512 megs of RAM. Phones with less than that may crash!This is a 2-night demo of the game. If you enjoyed it, get the full version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf4In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.
descriptionHTML:
NOTE: This game requires at least 512 megs of RAM. Phones with less than that may crash!

This is a 2-night demo of the game. If you enjoyed it, get the full version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf4

In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.

You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.
summary: This time, the terror has followed you home!
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 Demo

description: Driving Simulation, Parking addiction, job based levels, Hours of game play and nonstop fun is on the roads. Drive big and heavy trucks on the vast roads of the grand cities. Explore the new highways and have fun while driving.This simulator game offers a real truck driving experience that will let you become a real trucker. This  City Heavy Cargo Truck Jobs: Driving & Simulation  delivers an exciting driving and transporting experience with realistic controls, engine sounds and fantastic city environment. Travel across different cities and off road countryside areas in new trucks in each cargo mission.You can transport cool stuff such as cold drink containers, trees logs, food, water & fuel tankers and many more. Play the realistic simulator, transport cargo, earn money and buy new trucks, customize them or upgrade. Start your engine and move your heavy truck out of the parking. Find and select the job for you. When the job is selected, you will be asked to drive to the container to attach with the truck. Container position will be marked on the map, displayed on the screen. Navigate the truck to the container and attach it.  Multiple Trucks:   There are different types of trucks in the game. Select, customize and upgrade your trucks at your own choice.  Variety of Jobs:   This is a job base transportation and driving simulation game. There are no typical level selections but a little advance system of jobs and tasks. One after the other job, continuous game play gives you a real life transport system. Transporting wood logs, foods and cold drinks containers, water supply tankers, fuel tankers transportation are the basic jobs to do.Every job has different cash, rewarded at the end of the job. You can buy and upgrade trucks and customize them. Game Save Mode:   This is a new and unique feature but very effective as well. Game Save Mode is an advance gaming feature. On the long drive drivers need rest in real life, as same as in this game. This feature gives the truck drivers an opportunity to stop the truck at specific rest areas and can save the game. Players can resume the game from the save point at any time. Their game progress and game data will not be lost. There are three slots given to save the game at three different points. If there is a need to save the game more than three times, you can save but 4th will be saved at 1st (oldest one) saved point.  Cash Loose:  Yes you may have lost your money too. In every business there aren’t only profits. Chances of loosing cash in this game are present. When you are on the roads, these are the possible fines you have to pay instantly;Accidents with Other traffic vehiclesHitting with the on road obstaclesOver speeding finesSOS: This is an emergency button, when driver stuck in a situation where he can’t find a way or out of fuel or stuck in a place where he can’t even move. Upon pressing this SOS button driver have to pay some fee and he will be out of any problem. Become a professional big truck driver and explore the new trucking areas. Features: 	Map including the fuel points and rest areas displayed	Realistic truck physics 	AI (Artificial Intelligence)Traffic cars system	A variety Of trucks to drive	Truck upgrade & customization System	Lots of trailers and goods to transport	Realistic Day & night cycle System	In game Visual and mechanical damage on vehicles	Fuel consumption and Fines	Improved & smooth controls, tilting, buttons and steering wheel controls	Dashboard Camera view for all trucks	Cool and optimized graphics	SOS for emergencyLet's Start the 18 Wheeler Heavy cargo Truck engine, drive the heavy duty vehicles on the highways, the vast road of the city and off-road area between the beautiful mountains.Try to be the best Truck Driver in the trucking world.Come On, Drive before the supplies ran out!
descriptionHTML:
Driving Simulation, Parking addiction, job based levels, Hours of game play and nonstop fun is on the roads. Drive big and heavy trucks on the vast roads of the grand cities. Explore the new highways and have fun while driving.

This simulator game offers a real truck driving experience that will let you become a real trucker. This City Heavy Cargo Truck Jobs: Driving & Simulation delivers an exciting driving and transporting experience with realistic controls, engine sounds and fantastic city environment. Travel across different cities and off road countryside areas in new trucks in each cargo mission.

You can transport cool stuff such as cold drink containers, trees logs, food, water & fuel tankers and many more. Play the realistic simulator, transport cargo, earn money and buy new trucks, customize them or upgrade.

Start your engine and move your heavy truck out of the parking. Find and select the job for you. When the job is selected, you will be asked to drive to the container to attach with the truck. Container position will be marked on the map, displayed on the screen. Navigate the truck to the container and attach it.

Multiple Trucks: There are different types of trucks in the game. Select, customize and upgrade your trucks at your own choice.

Variety of Jobs: This is a job base transportation and driving simulation game. There are no typical level selections but a little advance system of jobs and tasks. One after the other job, continuous game play gives you a real life transport system.
Transporting wood logs, foods and cold drinks containers, water supply tankers, fuel tankers transportation are the basic jobs to do.
Every job has different cash, rewarded at the end of the job. You can buy and upgrade trucks and customize them.

Game Save Mode: This is a new and unique feature but very effective as well. Game Save Mode is an advance gaming feature. On the long drive drivers need rest in real life, as same as in this game. This feature gives the truck drivers an opportunity to stop the truck at specific rest areas and can save the game.

Players can resume the game from the save point at any time. Their game progress and game data will not be lost. There are three slots given to save the game at three different points. If there is a need to save the game more than three times, you can save but 4th will be saved at 1st (oldest one) saved point.

Cash Loose: Yes you may have lost your money too. In every business there aren’t only profits. Chances of loosing cash in this game are present. When you are on the roads, these are the possible fines you have to pay instantly;

Accidents with Other traffic vehicles
Hitting with the on road obstacles
Over speeding fines

SOS: This is an emergency button, when driver stuck in a situation where he can’t find a way or out of fuel or stuck in a place where he can’t even move. Upon pressing this SOS button driver have to pay some fee and he will be out of any problem.
Become a professional big truck driver and explore the new trucking areas.

Features:

 Map including the fuel points and rest areas displayed
 Realistic truck physics
 AI (Artificial Intelligence)Traffic cars system
 A variety Of trucks to drive
 Truck upgrade & customization System
 Lots of trailers and goods to transport
 Realistic Day & night cycle System
 In game Visual and mechanical damage on vehicles
 Fuel consumption and Fines
 Improved & smooth controls, tilting, buttons and steering wheel controls
 Dashboard Camera view for all trucks
 Cool and optimized graphics
 SOS for emergency


Let's Start the 18 Wheeler Heavy cargo Truck engine, drive the heavy duty vehicles on the highways, the vast road of the city and off-road area between the beautiful mountains.Try to be the best Truck Driver in the trucking world.

Come On, Drive before the supplies ran out!
developerAddress: Plaza # 45, Bahria town phase 8, Rawalpindi, Pakistan
summary: Drive heavy trucks, experience heavy vehicles parking & transport jobs
title: Speedy Truck Driver Simulator: Offroad Transport

"Crazy AA" is funny mobile action game. This game screen is simple, a rotation ball in the center, some radiant balls (like needles) surrounding it, players need to launch radiant ball to the rotation ball one by one, but must not touch others.

The game screen is simple, beige background, the central place with a constantly rotating sphere, like a mysterious planet in the universe, stood waiting for launch several balls below.

Game play is very simple, when the ball kept turning when everyone simply by clicking on the screen, so that the bottom of the screen with a number of small balls stick to the big ball, all balls straight with numbers are glued to finish. Seemingly simple operation and play, but want the ball is not hit with a number next to the ball, the game will end.

As the game going, the needles will be more and more, the rotation ball may be quickly or slowly, this game become harder.And it has lots of levels. description: Welcome to Exploration 2018 !!Enjoy a crafting experience like no other, with endless fun in an endless 3D environment. Craft your dream home, everything is possible on this pro 3d version.Explore this world and start living your dreams and imagination. Choose between flat creative mod, where you can build whatever you desire or terain mod where you need to build along mmountains and lakes, each day is a new challenge.Build you home during daytime and you will have a shelter at night time. Build a simple house or craft your dream castle – it's all in your hands.Get different blocks and craft them to get the desired output. The possibilities are endless.Go online – connect to a server and play with others. You can choose a server which is on creative mod or one that is on survival mod, easily choose one of the list and join of Minetest servers. Connecting is simple and fast. You can even start your own local server where you can later play with your friends. Start crafting in creative mode. Fear no more from all the spiders and mobs. You can be certain that no one is coming to hurt you. In this mode, you can just take your time and build things for the sake of building them and creating fun stuff. Choose from diverse types of building blocks, so you can create different objects or buildings. Find boxes or other cool things that you can later gather together.Play against your friends or by yourself. You can craft with others or just do things by yourself. Here you can also choose between the 2 modes, depending on the server you choose. Each server has its own guidelines and gaming mode – just read it and have fun. Read more:- Two modes of the game "Creative" and "Survival";- Beautiful graphics, multiplayer;- 3D set of blocks, tools and tools for construction;- Various plants and animals;- Scary monsters and strong zombies;- Crafty skeletons and huge spiders;- Cows, pigs, sheep and other peaceful mobs;- Change of time of day (day, night);- Flight mode;- You can improve the graphics;- In the "Survival" mode, you can turn on a peaceful mode without monsters;- You can play alone and with friends online.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Exploration 2018 !!
Enjoy a crafting experience like no other, with endless fun in an endless 3D environment. Craft your dream home, everything is possible on this pro 3d version.
Explore this world and start living your dreams and imagination. Choose between flat creative mod, where you can build whatever you desire or terain mod where you need to build along mmountains and lakes, each day is a new challenge.
Build you home during daytime and you will have a shelter at night time. Build a simple house or craft your dream castle – it's all in your hands.
Get different blocks and craft them to get the desired output. The possibilities are endless.
Go online – connect to a server and play with others. You can choose a server which is on creative mod or one that is on survival mod, easily choose one of the list and join of Minetest servers. Connecting is simple and fast. You can even start your own local server where you can later play with your friends.

Start crafting in creative mode. Fear no more from all the spiders and mobs. You can be certain that no one is coming to hurt you. In this mode, you can just take your time and build things for the sake of building them and creating fun stuff. Choose from diverse types of building blocks, so you can create different objects or buildings. Find boxes or other cool things that you can later gather together.
Play against your friends or by yourself. You can craft with others or just do things by yourself. Here you can also choose between the 2 modes, depending on the server you choose. Each server has its own guidelines and gaming mode – just read it and have fun.

Read more:
- Two modes of the game "Creative" and "Survival";
- Beautiful graphics, multiplayer;
- 3D set of blocks, tools and tools for construction;
- Various plants and animals;
- Scary monsters and strong zombies;
- Crafty skeletons and huge spiders;
- Cows, pigs, sheep and other peaceful mobs;
- Change of time of day (day, night);
- Flight mode;
- You can improve the graphics;
- In the "Survival" mode, you can turn on a peaceful mode without monsters;
- You can play alone and with friends online.
summary: Start your construction today! Create your infinite fictional world!
title: Exploration Lite 2018

descriptionHTML:
Download and play Adventure Aladin Pyramid World, a new aladin adventure game for boys and girls. Explore the cave of wonder with awesome platform as you control as the prince to collect gold coins, magical oil lamps and special items and explore the mysterious temple pyramid environment in this fantasy game.
Facing the unknown fear & danger, hostile arrows and fireball attacks; Help him destroy all the guardian monster by using all the available power ups as you dash, jump, swim and slash you way through the Ancient Egypt where there are powerful Gods and everything was surrounded with gold and luxury. Can you survive as far as you could and rescue his princess from the devil force?
Enter the Mystical Pyramid and race against your friends to see who can complete the level first. Find out where the magical stone is hidden and take the stone to the right place. Rush as fast as you can and pick up power-ups to attack enemy, achieve high score by collecting all special item and defeat the final boss. Remember to solve the mystery puzzle and find out all the secret area.

Install this lost pyramid game in your device now to bring your childhood memory back. Classic gameplay with modern interface and new challenging levels.

-------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO PLAY
-------------------------------------------------------
1. Control pad and buttons available to control the prince
2. Collect as many gold coin as you can and do not fall off the pit
3. Reach the end of the map to complete a level
------------------------------------------------------
FEATURES
------------------------------------------------------
1. Smooth control interface
2. More than 4 worlds you can play and more levels will be added in future.
3. Great graphic, good soundtrack
4. Challenging gameplay and highly addictive
5. Suitable for all ages and even kids!

If you like aladin games this is probably for you!

comments: This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

For a shoot 'em up racing android game it's really addictive. I'm always playing it. It's fun. My only complaint is the time it takes for the fuel to charge, 30 mins? Come on! Otherwise very challenging. Challenge accepted!

I really enjoyed this game until it started crashing mid game. Happened to me just recently and I wasted all my available fuel trying to frantically restart the game.  I was just completing the assigned jobs when the game suddenly stalled and I had to restart it again just to find it stalling again, all the while consuming the fuel with each restart. Hope to see this problem rectified soon, otherwise it's an enjoyable game nonetheless.
I enjoy playing the game. I gave you 2 stars because of one thing: the fuels are gone after I open my data connection even though it just got 5/5. Can domebody please tell me where did the fuels go..

comments: Accidently find this interesting game. This one feel somehow different. I'm surprise this rather 3D game work smooth on my junk device. I also found the devs also helpful & fast. All I did was sent an email complete with my info and server, my issue fixed as they replied.

I give this a 1 star for 5 mins trying to get pass the login srccen, still trying. :(  My usenane ingame is sweetheart, my only problem with this game is that I can't login on any of the servers and play this great game. I just not un-installed & leave it be.

After dev's response, I try to install once again and this time I can play. Now the review : (+) Space theme, 3D(smooth enough imo), pretty friendly to F2P (-) Stupid AI - instead of focus on one enemy they attack randomly, the heroines are from animes not original created character so it is kind of silly/not match to see a girl in school uniform fighting in space, horrible translation feels like machine translated. If the translation is good, 5 stars is certain. Sorry for my bad english.:)

Hi was playing this game for a couple days, and i think this quiet interesting, until yesterday i can open the game properly, it always stuck in notification screen, at "tap to start" screen to be exactly. the game just freeze, but the music keep playing. plz fix this, 5star if you fix this

Graphics are exceptional, gameplay is good, but the game crashes every few minutes, the english is pretty bad, and so is the grammar. Without the game directing me, I can't understand half of what the characters say. Other than that it seems like a pretty decent game so far.

Overall the game was pretty good. There's a couple of issues. First, in battle you can't control anything, skills, who you attack, etc. The second thing is something got lost in the translation . You should see the dialogue,  hilarious! Won't hold that one against you though. The two issues aside, good game.

High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

descriptionHTML:
Want to clash with 110 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES
☆ An Open-World Mobile Game ☆
Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!
☆ Finding Friends ☆
Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together!
☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?!
☆ Powerful Heroes ☆
Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!
☆ Master Your Strategy ☆
How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG!
☆ Animated Battles ☆
Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics!
☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆
Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile!
☆ Choose Your Path ☆
Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?
☆ Summon Familiars ☆
Forge pacts with fearsome monsters and make them Familiars! Train and groom your new companions to their full potential. With their powers by your side, nothing can stand in your way!

Write your own legacy, only in LORDS MOBILE!

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/LordsMobile
Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.

[App Permission]

description: Let’s rise for super hero fighting games in this grand city rescue where the call of captain robot soldier has been made. Be the hero fighter in superhero crime city battle with flying robot soldier captain coming to city rescue from gangster squad. Transform robot games with flying robot skills to rescue city and battle crime city in this evil vs superhero city rescue. Super city hero fighter will come to the city rescue of people. Flying robot captain soldier will come to rescue the city and help us police. US police is having an operation against the gangsters to bring peace to the city. They need help of the future hero because you as the flying robot have ultimate powers to counter the gangster squad. Get ready for the ultimate free action games and play super city flying robot exciting levels to combat fight like amazing captain robot soldier. The city is under the attack of evil. Be the steel hero legend of America and play as the amazing captain savior. Prepare yourself to be the robot soldier warrior and come to the emergency city rescue ops. US police officers have requested a call of super hero captain as he is known to be the hero fighting expert in this super city fighting games to battle against the gangster squad. Be the real iron hero and lead the us police force from front as the captain robot soldier. Use your advanced super robotic machine gun and eliminate gangster squad where needed. Show your super flying robot skills, attack the criminals and save this grand city from all sorts of threats and terror.Flying robot has amazing captain controls to perform city rescue ops. Superhero games with fighting games are the best combination to test the determination of hero fighting who believes to rescue the states from criminals. Fly over the super city to rescue people in emergency situations and take them to ambulance. Give a hard time to criminals escaping from the grand city jail combating police officers. The duty is to play the role of captain robot soldier and answer the call of superhero in this free action games as the hero fighter robot soldier game.  ★★★ GAMEPLAY FEATURES ★★★• Amazing City Environment• Superb Flying Robot City Rescue Game• Great Robot Controls and Animations• High Quality 3D Graphics and Sound Effects• Interesting Challenging Scenarios

comments: I would have given it a 5 star if only for the button for the diamonds for certain purchases.   I have been unintentionally pressing it and it automatically deducts my diamonds.  I lost more than 150 diamonds already because of this.  And it made me think of leaving the game.  I hope ALL diamond purchases have another box for confirmation.  Also, it'll be awesome if we can resell items that we own.  😊

This is a great game. Things balance out in terms of time and crafting. You can also earn diamonds fairly easily so you don't need to buy anything. The only issues I have is the market place, everything is gone as soon as you open it, even if you opened it exactly when it refreshes.

It an amazing game just wish it would quite lagging and miss connecting. Would be nice is you could sell some of those free gifts you get or the stuff you buy and don't need like the decorations. All they do is stock up and never get used. Be nice to sell them so you can get more money.

I really love playing this game, but it keeps kicking me out of the game like a lot. I want to keep playing but if this problem doesn't get fixed I will have to uninstall. Thanks...update,  I bought a new cell phone.  I'm hoping that this new phone fixed the problem of me getting kicked off the game all the time.  I'll let u know.

Good game to pass time  . Just too expensive to buy new items and also annoyed by the buy but have to build items. Also i just added friends thru d game n would be glad if theres also a lil' chat box or acknowledging box (wanna thank those game friends since i dnt know them personally 😊) . Looking forward to this game being playable offline (my wish) .

Adorable graphics! Great concept. Missed the bar with execution. Feels like they rush you too much right away with what you have to do and the time needed to do it. Not nearly enough slots open to complete orders properly and smoothly.... I have played too many similar games to know that it shouldn't be this frustrating.  Just some minor tweaks needed. I think if I just ignore my customers completely for a couple levels and give myself some good headway it will be more enjoyable but I'm afraid the problem will still persist... With how really cute the graphics are (complete with adorable cows and deeply chickens)I'm very sad that I may just have to look for a better one.

description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. The car wash station is fully automatic all you need to do is park the luxury car inside car wash and repair games. Simulate your world and tuneup police car engine inside the repair shop garage. The repair shop garage is located next to the paint shop at highway gas station games. This repair shop garage is equipped with all the latest car mechanic simulator tools. This is perfect blend of top rated games like police car parking and smart car wash games.Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking Game Features:Challenging time based luxury car washing, refuel and paint job levelsMultiple muscle car customization: suv, sedan, prado, corvette, limo Realistic highway service gas station environment to drive onUltra realistic police car physics with real v8 engine soundsSmooth vehicle controls for immersive gameplayDownload Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking games now for FREE & entertain yourself!

comments: Its a great game but you should add upgradeable parts, and be able to build an engine from scratch. Another thing add more things to do to the body like tires and maybe interiors. Please put this in your next update I will do an even better review. Let me what you think about these ideas.

I really loved this game! But I made an in app purchase, paid the money but the game didn't acknowledge the purchase, took the money but didn't give me the gold! Emailed to resolve but got no response. Very disappointed.

Can't remove parts on the car that you get right after the tutorial car. If it wasn't for this issue I can see where the dev is going and could be a great time passer. Shame it's broke as soon as it starts.

Great game! Has a lot of potential. Very good for explaining and learning the basic concepts of car repair. Has an expanded break down of all parts which shows you a great diagram of how parts are put together. Only app I have found in the app store that goes into detail!

This is a homerun!!! It's not too complicated that it discourages continuous play but some parts are complicated enough to keep you engaged. I'd like to see more car models soon. But this is hours of fun right now!

Liked the look of it, got past the first intro bit where u fix the first car and it shows u how to get the next car but then when I go to tap and hold on a engine part to get rid of it it doesn't let me it just stays normal or rotates the camera, so couldn't play any further, so can't give a fair review unfortunately as I couldn't experience it properly

comments: This isnt really even a game it is more like if you could control almost everyting you did in your life. It is extremley interesting and i wasted hours on this game when i was supposed to do some self assigned homework😂😂 my guy died in prison and he had 6 kids. He lived a good life. He had over 1 million dollars in cash and in net worth. RIP sean. You will be missed

Very run game.  Just wish you could save your progress when you have to exit out for a phone call, text messages, reboot the device or anything that requires you to exit.  That's the only reason I gave 4 🌟's. Once they add save life option I will change to 5 🌟's. Great game though. Would recommend everyone to try this game.

This is possibly the greatest game on the Store right now. There so much you can do in the game and I'm excited to see what will come. And the best part is that this game doesn't require internet to play and doesn't have a great deal of ads. My friends all have iPhones and say that this game looks sweet and ask if its in the Apple Store. I have to say no, but if you guys ever plan on making an Apple version, that'd be pretty cool on their end.

Add new jobs like soldier, police, and fire fighters. I love it. Can you add maps so you can see what the world looks like after war. Also can you add when wars happen a country can be annexed. Also add times of years like your born in 1984 or something like that. Edit: Make where you can be president or make rebellions. Add where what province/kingdom/state. Just some suggestions or you can make a Instlife2

This game is going the right way and it could add a lot more stuff like To be able to join the military, police or even fight in a war. The devs should also add more option where you can create your custom life because changing name and location is not enough. Can't wait for the next update :)

I would be happy if you could add an Racing Driver career. I'd could start with Karts at the age 4-6 and you must battle your way trough the Race series. At the End, if your good enough you could drive in Formula 1 or Nascar or DTM( Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft ). I come out Germany and I'm was amazed by Vettel and Schumacher. It's only a wish but it would be Cool if you could add my idea. If I have writing mistakes I am sorry but English is not my main Language. Bye your Johannes
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
developerAddress:
71-75 Shelton Street,
Covent Garden,
London,
WC2H 9JQ

★ Game Story ★
Each hero has his background story. Meanwhile, An AI (Artificial Intelligence) has been created to study their stories and interpret them to you. You can't predict the enemies and dangers ahead of you. But whatever out there, you need to be fearless and unstoppable. Let the enemies hear your roar and the majesty of the master is enough to deter the enemy. Timidity is never the name of the master of the arcade!

comments: Great storyline, smooth gameplay controls although on-off some screen freeze, not a restart app can't fix so din bother me much. I jus wished there's option for saved folders so that I can try out different choices and see what is the difference in endings and storyline.
Well done stories and tough choices make this game stand out. I do wish progression didn't force you to repeat the same levels so many times, and waiting for results seems unnecessary and annoying.
Loved the game, was awesome!!  Then I logged in one day and it reverted my progress back to weeks ago.  Lost so much time spent.  Done playing.

Game is fantastically entertaining. It is a mix of game styles including hidden objects, detective investigation, path choice/role playing and, better yet, high quality play for free. It is intuitive and easy to learn but also becomes challenging as the acts unlock. Very fun!
That's what's called STORYTELLING! GRIPPING, THRILLING AND A TRULY PHENOMENAL EXPERIENCE. JUST LIKE THE ORIGINAL SHOW!!!
Best game ever.....!!!! Better than other... Investigation games.... Good graphics..... Skillful and it's like real life enquiry

comments: This game has a chip sale and it never pays out. It constantlyI takes it all back. I have been playing DoubleDown Casino for over a year now. I have enjoyed the game tremendously. However I noticed that I purchased chips all the time. The game takes all the chips each time and you have to repurchase. I have a Samsung Galaxy 6 Edge Plus. I have tried to install DoubleDown Casino many times and it always crashes. So for now I will not install it on my phone. I am still playing,its addicting..but i am still looking for other games to fill my time.

Graphics are totally messed up at start up.  I cannot see games. The games that appear are games I do not play. I have deleted and readded casino but games are still not showing. Wheel spins give low points. Hard to get high points. When you manage to get a good score, it takes away until you get low. I like the games but often lose down to nothing. I will not buy credit for any games I play so if losing  credit is an attempt to get me to buy, forget it. I have kept this casino open longer than any others because I actually like the games.

This game is HORRIBLE for paying anything back. You can legit go through 100,000 in 4 minutes because there are next to no pay. Nevermind the crampy 4,000 pay back..   or you get one decent win then nothing because it's taken all back.  The daily reward is rarely gives out anything more than 65,000 same with friends gifts.

Used to play the Brady Bunch slot many years ago, was great! Was stoked when you came out with Cats and other games that are in casinos. Slots are tighter than real casinos too. You loose and then they give you a little win and want to be rated. Makes me want to stop not buy credits.

I have played this game for a very long time but I'm not very happy about how many times it stop.  Daily, something goes wrong with the app.  Please does anyone know what's going on and fix it?  Thanks

This is the worse paying game I've played ,came back a few times just to see if it would hit but all you do is spend money. Too bad because there are good games. I sure didn't experience what your reviews said they did.

descriptionHTML:

We have exquisite picture, maverick protagonist, cool and gorgeous battle, strange and novel mega monsters. Colorful activities will bring you adventure, exciting and other unprecedented game experience.

Tap! Tap!! Tap!!! To fight the demonlord.

The characters can also improve their attack power through skill progression, upgrading of treasures, etc. When the number of levels is higher, the rewards will be improved.

The game is not only to compete with the big monster, the mastery of time and the casting of skills are also a major topic.

Don't forget to use various resources to improve your fighting power. Bring your pet and let's drop the BOSS together!!
